#!/usr/bin/env bash [[ -f "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" ]] && . "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh"
require_cmd "${TM_HG:=hg}" "If you have installed hg, then you need to either update your <tt>PATH</tt> or set the <tt>TM_HG</tt> shell variable (e.g. in Preferences / Advanced)"
if [[ -d "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" ]] then export WorkPath="$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY"; cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" else export WorkPath="$TM_DIRECTORY" fi
cd "${TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY:-$TM_DIRECTORY}" ruby -- "${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/hg_update.rb"
# will cause current file to be re-loaded rescan_project
